name: CAMPBELL'S® Fish Stew
author: Campbell's Canada
summary: Fresh fish fillets cooked in a stew with onions, garlic, potatoes, and tomato make this recipe an instant hit.
ingredients: 1 (900 ml) carton CAMPBELL'S® 30% Less Sodium Ready To Use Seafood Broth
9 ounces boneless firm-fleshed white fish, cut into bite-sized pieces
9 ounces uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
directions: In a large pot, heat oil over medium
Add onion, fennel, and garlic; cook 3 to4 minutes, stirring frequently, or until starting to soften
Add broth, potatoes, tomato, and saffron, if using
Bring to a simmer; reduce heat, cover and cook 12 to 15 minutes or until potatoes are tender
Gently stir in fish and shrimp
Bring back to a simmer 3 to 5 minutes or until shrimp are pink and fish flakes easily
Serve immediately with crusty bread, if desired
